Text:
This is infact one of the best and most unique bands in the world, much better then lots of the anglo/american stuff. 
Incredible musicians.
I still got most of their albums on vinyl Lp's, but not the 1970 release. Thank you and greatings from scandinavia.

Ps. the band are still going strong as far as I know. The dvd set was awesome. I hope to go down and see them live some day, that would be a dream.
